alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:59AM CST until January 28 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 97.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the lake, especially the north end of the lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 97.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CST Thursday was 97.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 96.2 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 97.2 Thu 9 am CST 97.1 96.9 96.6 &&
